long_description: With full visibility in every direction, the Ticla TeaHouse 2 Tent begs the question: why drive to a beautiful landscape and then pitch a tent from which the two of you can't see a thing?. Car campers who like views and ventilation will enjoy full visibility, kid- and dog-friendly durability, spacious floor plan and a storage tote that's easy to pack and unpack. Awning-style rainfly provides excellent coverage without compromising views or ventilation. Strong and smooth shockcorded aluminum poles withstand the elements. The Ticla TeaHouse 2 Tent fits in a 8 x 5 ft. space, making it perfect for festivals and small campsites.
short_description: With full visibility in every direction, the Ticla TeaHouse 2 Tent begs the question: why drive to a beautiful landscape and then pitch a tent from which the two of you can't see a thing?.
